attributes.action: Provide tax relief for companies that use recycled/recyclable materials for letter communications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many letters do you receive from companies which have plastic 'windows' within the envelopes?
How many people take the effort to remove the plastic window in order to recycle the envelope (and in many cases, it's contents)?

This petition is to encourage companies to take measures to ensure that all materials used in marketing and day-to-day communications are suitable for recycling.

Please sign up to support this initiative.
